title: Artificial intelligence, hologram tech bring 'Arjuna', 'Lord Krishna' at AI Summit
description: New Delhi, Feb 20 (PTI) Through cutting-edge hologram technology and power of artificial intelligence, ‘Lord Krishna’ and warrior ‘Arjuna’ from the epic Mahabharat have assumed a hi-tech digital avatar at a pavilion of the AI Impact Summit in Delhi. At the ‘Jio Intelligence’ pavilion of Reliance Industries, the company has also given a glimpse of […]
content:
Flanking the cove are two long transparent cylindrical capsules, inside of which an AI-generated images each of ‘Lord Krishna’ and ‘Arjuna’, as in the series, have been projected.

title: "Great meeting": OpenAI CEO Altman on meeting PM Modi, says "incredible energy around AI in India"
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman described his meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday as 'great' and highlighted the remarkable momentum of artificial intelligence adoption in India as the country hosts the India AI Impact Summit 2026 in the national capital.
content: New Delhi [India], February 20 (ANI): OpenAI CEO Sam Altman described his meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday as "great" and highlighted the remarkable momentum of artificial intelligence adoption in India as the country hosts the Ind... [2720 chars]

title: PM Modi holds bilateral talks with top leaders of Mauritius, Sri Lanka and Slovakia
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met with leaders from Mauritius, Sri Lanka, and Slovakia. Discussions focused on enhancing cooperation in trade and technology. He also met with the UN Secretary General to discuss making artificial intelligence inclusive. India reaffirmed its support for global AI efforts and UN reforms. These meetings aimed to strengthen bilateral ties and regional security.

title: Cyber Safety: A Call to Action by India's Judiciary
description: Chief Justice of India Justice Surya Kant highlighted the urgent need for coordinated action against rising cybercrimes at a cyber security conference. He emphasized the judiciary's role and the global nature of the problem. He also addressed the use of artificial intelligence in justice, advocating for ethical restraint.
content: On Friday, Justice Surya Kant, Chief Justice of India, underscored the necessity of coordinated efforts to combat the increasing issue of cybercrime during a cyber security conference. He referred to the alarming scale of cyber offenses and emphasize... [560 chars]

title: ICE, Inflation and AI Ethics: The Week in Review
description: Ethical debates roil the artificial intelligence industry, and rising prices may be trouble for Republicans.

title: The $450 billion question: Can Amazon’s AI gamble justify historic market carnage?
description: Amazon’s stock rebounded slightly after a historic nine-day losing streak that erased over $450 billion in market value, triggered by a massive $200 billion spending plan for 2024. The unprecedented capital expenditure, a 60% surge from 2023, is primarily for artificial intelligence infrastructure, sparking investor fears over severely reduced free cash flow. This aggressive spending […]
content:
